item.description:
4:30PM Mix and Mingle with other Classical Indian Music Enthusiasts. Chai tea is provided by hostess

5:00 - 7:30PM SITAR and TABLA CONCERT and Fund raiser

$10 donation is requested

Park at Alewife Station, Take the Red Line one stop to Davis square T stop. Walk a few blocks from the T stop. No parking available unless you are a Somerville resident. Limited metered lot parking is available in Davis Square if you find a spot. Come early of you are driving.)

Directions will be sent to "yes" and "Maybe" rsvps

LIMITED to 10 so please considerate to your hostess & show if your rsvp "yes", sorry no "maybes"

Here's the description:
http://www.facebook.c...

http://www.facebook.c...
item.how_to_find_us: Lauren's cell 617-233-5927 Email with directions will be sent out by 12 noon Friday to a private house in somerville
item.name: Indian Classical Music Concert
